Multi-column layout examples

Column One

It is a period of civil war. Rebel spaceships, striking from a hidden base, have won their first victory against the evil Galactic Empire. During the battle, Rebel spies managed to steal secret plans to the Empire’s ultimate weapon, the DEATH STAR, an armored space station with enough power to destroy an entire planet. Pursued by the Empire’s sinister agents, Princess Leia races home aboard her starship, custodian of the stolen plans that can save her people and restore freedom to the galaxy.....

Column Two

A peep at some distant orb has power to raise and purify our thoughts like a strain of sacred music, or a noble picture, or a passage from the grander poets.

A peep at some distant orb has power to raise and purify our thoughts like a strain of sacred music, or a noble picture, or a passage from the grander poets.

Card tag

This example headline has 40 characters

A description with a maximum of 140 characters. That means we usually only have room for one or two sentences. Here is what that looks like.

A short inline text cta

Sphinx of black quartz, judge my vow!

Multi-column layouts can changed depending on the size of their container, as well as the size of the viewport.

Medium container

mzp-t-columns-two

Column One

A peep at some distant orb has power to raise and purify our thoughts like a strain of sacred music, or a noble picture, or a passage from the grander poets.
